Class ControlledObject

  • java.lang.Object
    • ControlledObject
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.event.KeyListener, java.util.EventListener, SpaceObject

    public class ControlledObject
extends java.lang.Object
implements SpaceObject, java.awt.event.KeyListener
    Author:
    Mikhail Controlled Object class is going to be a ship User will be able to control ship Movement allowed will be strictly up / down Left right Keyboard is hooked into that class
